amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds for the Women and Infants Hospital, Rhode Island.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1713 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1713 proposed by Senator Lankford. (consideration: CR S2582-2583) To prohibit the use of funds for the Women and Infants Hospital, Rhode Island.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1713 proposed by Senator Lankford.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1713 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
